CustomField.formula: "Opportunity Id:"+Opportunity__c+", Opportunity Name:"+Opportunity__r.Name +", NSR NAME:"+ Prospect_Ownership__r.NSR_Name__r.FirstName +" "+Prospect_Ownership__r.NSR_Name__r.LastName +", Run-Effective Date:" +TEXT(MONTH(Opportunity__r.CloseDate))+"/"+TEXT(DAY(Opportunity__r.CloseDate))+"/"+TEXT(YEAR(Opportunity__r.CloseDate)) +", Stage:"+ TEXT(Opportunity__r.StageName) +", Created Date:"+TEXT(Opportunity__r.CreatedDate) +", Created By:"+ Opportunity__r.CreatedBy.FirstName +" "+Opportunity__r.CreatedBy.LastName
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Information on the records attached to this junction object.
CustomField.label: Link Info
